member.name: M:VotOEApi.Controllers.AllVotesController.#ctor(Logic.IAllVotesLogic)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the AllVotes Controller

member.returns: A collection of all the votes
member.remarks: Lists all the past and present votes

member.param: The ID of the AllVotes in question
member.remarks: Returns a single AllVotes, specified by it's ID

member.name: M:VotOEApi.Controllers.AllVotesController.DeleteVote(System.Int32)
member.param: The ID of the AllVotes to be deleted

member.name: M:VotOEApi.Controllers.AllVotesController.CreateVote(Models.AllVotes)
member.param: AllVotes object, containing the details of the vote to be created
member.returns: Http200 if ok

AllVotes object, containing the details of the vote to be updated

member.name: M:VotOEApi.Controllers.AllVotesController.GetAllActiveVotes
member.returns: A collection of every active vote

member.name: M:VotOEApi.Controllers.AllVotesController.GetAllUserAccessibleVotes
member.summary: Lists all votes avaliable to the logged in user
member.returns: A collection of the voting events that are avaliable to the currently authenticated user

member.name: M:VotOEApi.Controllers.AllVotesController.CloseAVote(System.Int32)
member.param: The id of the vote to be closed
member.returns: HTTP200 if all is good, 400 if not.

member.name: M:VotOEApi.Controllers.AllVotesController.FinishAVote(System.Int32)
member.param: The id of the vote to be marked
member.returns: HTTP200 if all is good, 400 if not.

member.name: M:VotOEApi.Controllers.AllVotesController.groupVotes(System.String)
member.summary: Gets all the voting events in the specified group
member.param: The name of the group we're looking for
member.returns: A collection of all the voting events matching the criteria

member.name: M:VotOEApi.Controllers.AllVotesController.participantCount(System.String)
member.summary: Number of unique users within a vote group
member.param: The name of the voteGroup we're looking for
member.returns: A collection of all the voting events matching the criteria

member.name: M:VotOEApi.Controllers.AllVotesController.winCheck(System.Int32)
member.summary: Check if a vote is won.
member.param: The id of the vote to be checked
member.remarks: Check if at this moment a vote meets every criteria required to be considered winning. This is not final, just the current state. It can change as more votes are submitted, if the vote is still ongoing.
member.returns: True if won, false if not

member.param: Login model, containing the details of the user to be created.
member.returns: Http200 if ok

member.returns: A collection of all the users

member.param: The id of the user
member.returns: A single user

member.param: Id of the user to be deleted

member.name: M:VotOEApi.Controllers.AuthController.Login(Models.Login)
member.remarks: Attempts to log in the user, and gives him a TokenModel if successful.

member.returns: A TokenModel if successful, BadRequest if not

member.returns: A collection of all the roles

member.summary: List the roles of a user

member.summary: Assign one or more roles to a user.

member.returns: Http200 if ok

member.param: The name of the new role
member.returns: Http200 if successful

member.name: M:VotOEApi.Controllers.AuthController.CreateRoleForVoteAsync(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String})
member.remarks: Auto-generate a new role, used during vote creation. Each new vote has an associated "requiredRole" field, containing the role name generated here. Users in the posession of this role can participate in the vote.
member.returns: The name of the new auto-generated role, or BadRequest if it failed

member.name: M:VotOEApi.Controllers.AuthController.makeTestRoleModelJson
member.returns: A RoleModel with some sample data

member.name: M:VotOEApi.Controllers.AuthController.makeUserAdmin(System.String)
member.param: The email of the user
member.returns: Http200 if successful
